title: SONOS PLAYBAR Behind the Scenes
description:
Enjoy this sneak peek into life at Sonos. As music lovers to the core, we aim to elevate the music experience with every product we create. We recently caught up with our Product Design Team to share what carried the PLAYBAR from initial concept into the homes of music lovers around the world. Take a look into the Sonos lab in our video.

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Sonos Home Audio products. Shop for the Sonos PLAYBAR and the full line of Sonos Home Audio products at Abt!
